column2: The local culture of [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] in my capital, [Root.Capital.GetName], has grown upon me and my family. We could choose to embrace it, which would bring numerous benefits, or we could keep to our old ways, which might also have its advantages.
column6: La cultura local de  [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] en mi capital, [Root.Capital.GetName], ha arraigado en mí y mi familia. Podríamos escoger adoptarla, lo que nos traería numerosos beneficios, o podríamos seguir las viejas costumbres, lo que también podría tener sus ventajas.

column2: My family and I will stay [Root.Culture.GetName].

Your vassal §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has decided to put aside [From.GetPossPronoun] §Y[emf_old_culture.GetName]§! culture and adopt the language and customs of your §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.
column6: Tu vasallo §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! ha decidido dejar de lado su cultura §Y[emf_old_culture.GetName]§! y adoptar el lenguaje y las costumbres de la cultura §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!.
